name: Meta Sudoku
description:
As an avid Sudoku enthusiast, I often spend an entire afternoon doing Sudoku puzzles to kill time, but some Sudoku games on Steam are unsatisfactory (such as UI, operation, experience, etc.), so I start to learn programming language and developed his own sudoku game in a few weeks -- meta-sudoku


Meta Sudoku is a minimalist puzzle game

Your only goal is to fill in the 9 numbers 1, 2, 3, up to 9 in the spaces in a 9 X 9 square according to the numbers given by the system, so that each row, every column, every A 3 X 3 house has nine numbers from 1 to 9, and there are no repetitions or omissions.

The rules are very simple, but it is not easy to get all the correct numbers. Meta Sudoku is perfect for exercising your brain while relaxing in your spare time. I have always been committed to providing the most comfortable experience for players.

The original idea of ​​making this game is because the UI and operation experience of some similar games on Steam (such as Miracle Sudoku, Sudoku Universe, Thermo Sudoku, etc.) are not very comfortable, so on the basis of these games, the integration of After some of my understanding of the game, I developed this game.

Thank you for your feedback and strong support for Yuan Sudoku. If you encounter problems with the game, the store page has misleading content, want to give comments and suggestions, or simply want to say hello, you can go through the Steam game forum or email Get in touch with me and I'll try to take the time to have a pleasant conversation with you, I'm sorry if I didn't respond to your message in a timely manner, it's probably not noticed, or I'm too busy, I'll try to avoid it as much as possible.

Thank you for taking the time to read this article, I really hope you enjoy my game. Y.J.------Matrix Science

Game Features:


1. The difficulty of the game is divided into 6 levels, namely easy, entry, advanced, difficult, master, master, each level contains 40 levels, and there are three additional super challenge levels, a total of 243 levels have been carefully prepared for you
2. Minimalist interface to provide you with the most comfortable visual effects
3. If you want, there are multiple color themes in the game for you to choose and replace, to avoid aesthetic fatigue as much as possible
4. Different color combinations and magnification effects make the numbers stand out and reduce the possibility of optical illusions
5. Several quiet, comfortable and relaxing ambient music to relieve your brain fatigue
6. Support English, Russian, Chinese, French and other languages
7. Provide the operation of withdrawal and recovery, you have the opportunity to go back
8. Support shortcut keys, reducing the complexity of the operation
9. Support the reminder function of the remaining numbers (this greatly saves the game time)
10. The game can be quit halfway, and the game can save time and progress (if you don't want to use this function, this can be changed in the settings interface)
11. Support Steam cloud archive, when the game data is accidentally cleaned up or the computer is replaced, you can download the previous progress through the Steam cloud at any time
12. There are a total of 20 simple style achievements that you need to complete
13. Support collectible cards, Steam badges
14. Super low pricing with recurring discounts
15. After careful consideration, I decided to provide more well-designed and beautiful levels for free in the future, and set a super low price for the original soundtrack package. I hope you are satisfied and like it!

The in-game audio is royalty-free from great sites like freeSound

This page uses DeepL translation, if there is any misleading content, misinformation or cultural sensitivity, please contact me in the Steam community or email. Thanks for your help and feedback.
